trailingComments.value:
*
 * This component contain your painting comment list
 * @param {object} user - user object from api
 * @param {object} setUser - user setter
 * @emits - api/painting_comment/byUserId: get list of user comments
 * @emits - api/painting_comment/byId?commentId=${comId} : delete selected comment
 * @emits - api/painting_comment/update : edit selected comment

innerComments.value: return { ...el, boolDelete: false, boolShare: false, boolEdit: false, boolV: true }
return { ...el, boolDelete: false, boolShare: false, boolEdit: false, boolV: false }

{ id: comId, content: comment[index].content, visibility: comment[index].visibility }, { headers: { "Access-Control-Allow-Origin": "*", "Content-Type": "application/json" } }
<input type="button" className=" openModalNow editComment" onClick={() => handleBoolEditTrue(index)} />
<input type="button" className=" openModalNow shareComment" onClick={() => handleBoolShareTrue(index)} />
<div id="comment0123_delete" className="smart-modal-content-l scrollAuto" style={{ transform: "translate(-50%,-50%)", display: "inline-flex", flexWrap: "wrap", minHeight: "0" }}>
handleBoolDeleteFalse(index)} />

handleBoolEditFalse(index)} />
<textarea onChange={(e) => editChange(e.target.value, index)} value={com.content} id="story" name="story" rows="5" cols="33" style={{height: "110px"}}></textarea>
<input type="text" size="55" placeholder="Ex : expressionnisme, surréalisme …" style={{width: "100%", marginTop: "20px"}}/>

handleBoolShareFalse(index)} />
